 1962: %% Test NIF maps handling.
 1963: maps(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1964:     TmpMem = tmpmem(),
 1965:     Pairs = [{adam, "bert"}] ++
 1966:             [{I,I}||I <- lists:seq(1,10)] ++
 1967: 	    [{a,value},{"a","value"},{<<"a">>,<<"value">>}],
 1968:     ok = ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 1969:     M  = maps_from_list_nif(Pairs),
 1970:     R = {RIs,Is} = sorted_list_from_maps_nif(M),
 1971:     io:format("Pairs: ~p~nMap: ~p~nReturned: ~p~n", [lists:sort(Pairs),M,R]),
 1972:     true = (lists:sort(Is) =:= lists:sort(Pairs)),
 1973:     Is = lists:reverse(RIs),
 1974: 
 1975:     #{} = maps_from_list_nif([]),
 1976:     {[],[]} = sorted_list_from_maps_nif(#{}),
 1977: 
 1978:     1 = is_map_nif(M),
 1979:     0 = is_map_nif("no map"),
 1980: 
 1981:     Msz = map_size(M),
 1982:     {1,Msz} = get_map_size_nif(M),
 1983:     {1,0} = get_map_size_nif(#{}),
 1984:     {0,-123} = get_map_size_nif({#{}}),
 1985: 
 1986:     #{} = M0 = make_new_map_nif(),
 1987: 
 1988:     {1, #{key := value}=M1} = make_map_put_nif(M0, key, value),
 1989:     {1, #{key := value, "key2" := "value2"}=M2} = make_map_put_nif(M1, "key2", "value2"),
 1990:     {1, #{key := "value", "key2" := "value2"}=M3} = make_map_put_nif(M2, key, "value"),
 1991:     {0, undefined} = make_map_put_nif(666, key, value),
 1992: 
 1993:     {1, "value2"} = get_map_value_nif(M3,"key2"),
 1994:     {0, undefined} = get_map_value_nif(M3,"key3"),
 1995:     {0, undefined} = get_map_value_nif(false,key),
 1996: 
 1997:     {0, undefined} = make_map_update_nif(M0, key, value),
 1998:     {0, undefined} = make_map_update_nif(M1, "key2", "value2"),
 1999:     {1, #{key := "value", "key2" := "value2"}} = make_map_update_nif(M2, key, "value"),
 2000:     {0, undefined} = make_map_update_nif(666, key, value),
 2001: 
 2002:     {1, #{}} = make_map_remove_nif(M1, key),
 2003:     {1, M1} = make_map_remove_nif(M2, "key2"),
 2004:     {1, M2} = make_map_remove_nif(M2, "key3"),
 2005:     {0, undefined} = make_map_remove_nif(self(), key),
 2006: 
 2007:     M1 = maps_from_list_nif(maps:to_list(M1)),
 2008:     M2 = maps_from_list_nif(maps:to_list(M2)),
 2009:     M3 = maps_from_list_nif(maps:to_list(M3)),
 2010: 
 2011:     %% Test different map sizes (OTP-15567)
 2012:     repeat_while(fun({35,_}) -> false;
 2013:                     ({K,Map}) ->
 2014:                          Map = maps_from_list_nif(maps:to_list(Map)),
 2015:                          Map = maps:filter(fun(K2,V) -> V =:= K2*100 end, Map),
 2016:                          {K+1, maps:put(K,K*100,Map)}
 2017:                  end,
 2018:                  {1,#{}}),
 2019: 
 2020:     M5 = lists:foldl(fun(N, MapIn) ->
 2021:                              {1, #{N := value}=MapOut} = make_map_put_nif(MapIn, N, value),
 2022:                              MapOut
 2023:                      end,
 2024:                      #{},
 2025:                      lists:seq(1,40)),
 2026:     M6 = lists:foldl(fun(N, MapIn) ->
 2027:                              {1, MapOut} = make_map_remove_nif(MapIn, N),
 2028:                              ok = maps:get(N, MapOut, ok),
 2029:                              MapOut
 2030:                      end,
 2031:                      M5,
 2032:                      lists:seq(1,40)),
 2033:     true = (M6 =:= #{}),
 2034: 
 2035:     has_duplicate_keys = maps_from_list_nif([{1,1},{1,1}]),
 2036: 
 2037:     verify_tmpmem(TmpMem),
 2038:     ok.
 2039:  
 2040: %% Test macros enif_make_list<N> and enif_make_tuple<N>
 2041: api_macros(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2042:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2043:     Expected = {[lists:seq(1,N) || N <- lists:seq(1,9)],
 2044: 		[list_to_tuple(lists:seq(1,N)) || N <- lists:seq(1,9)]
 2045: 	       },
 2046:     Expected = macros(list_to_tuple(lists:seq(1,9))),
 2047:     ok.
 2048: 
 2049: %% enif_make_[tuple|list]_from_array
 2050: from_array(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2051:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2052:     lists:foreach(fun(Tpl) ->
 2053: 			  Lst = tuple_to_list(Tpl),
 2054: 			  {Lst,Tpl} = tuple_2_list_and_tuple(Tpl)
 2055: 		  end,
 2056: 		  [{}, {1,2,3}, {[4,5],[],{},{6,7}}, {{}}, {[]}]),
 2057:     ok.
 2058: 
 2059: %% enif_inspect_iolist_as_binary
 2060: iolist_as_binary(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2061:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2062:     TmpMem = tmpmem(),
 2063:     List = [<<"hejsan">>, <<>>, [], [17], [<<>>],
 2064: 	    [127,128,255,0],
 2065: 	    [1, 2, 3, <<"abc">>, [<<"def">>,4], 5, <<"ghi">>],
 2066: 	    [1, 2, 3, <<"abc">>, [<<"def">>,4], 5 | <<"ghi">>]],
 2067: 	    
 2068:     lists:foreach(fun(IoL) ->
 2069: 			  B1 = erlang:iolist_to_binary(IoL),
 2070: 			  B2 = iolist_2_bin(IoL),
 2071: 			  B1 = B2
 2072: 		  end,
 2073: 		  List),
 2074:     verify_tmpmem(TmpMem),
 2075:     ok.
 2076: 
 2077: %% Test memory managed objects, aka 'resources'
 2078: resource(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2079:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2080:     Type = get_resource_type(0),
 2081:     resource_hugo(Type),
 2082:     resource_otto(Type),
 2083:     resource_new(Type),
 2084:     resource_neg(Type),
 2085:     ok.
 2086: 
 2087: resource_hugo(Type) ->
 2088:     DtorCall = resource_hugo_do(Type),
 2089:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2090:     DtorCall = last_resource_dtor_call(),
 2091:     ok.
 2092: 
 2093: resource_hugo_do(Type) ->
 2094:     HugoBin = <<"Hugo Hacker">>,
 2095:     HugoPtr = alloc_resource(Type, HugoBin),
 2096:     Hugo = make_resource(HugoPtr),
 2097:     true = is_reference(Hugo),
 2098:     release_resource(HugoPtr),
 2099:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2100:     {HugoPtr,HugoBin} = get_resource(Type,Hugo),
 2101:     {Pid,_} =
 2102:         spawn_monitor(fun() ->
 2103:                               receive {Pid, Type, Resource, Ptr, Bin} ->
 2104:                                       Pid ! {self(), got_it},
 2105:                                       receive {Pid, check_it} ->
 2106:                                               {Ptr,Bin} = get_resource(Type,Resource)
 2107:                                       end
 2108:                               end,
 2109:                               gc_and_exit(ok)
 2110:                       end),
 2111:     Pid ! {self(), Type, Hugo, HugoPtr, HugoBin},
 2112:     {Pid, got_it} = receive_any(),
 2113:     erlang:garbage_collect(),   % just to make our ProcBin move in memory
 2114:     Pid ! {self(), check_it},
 2115:     {'DOWN', _, process, Pid, ok} = receive_any(),
 2116:     [] = last_resource_dtor_call(),
 2117:     {HugoPtr,HugoBin} = get_resource(Type,Hugo),
 2118:     {HugoPtr, HugoBin, 1}.
 2119: 
 2120: gc_and_exit(Reason) ->
 2121:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2122:     exit(Reason).
 2123: 
 2124: resource_otto(Type) ->
 2125:     {OttoPtr, OttoBin} = resource_otto_do(Type),
 2126:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2127:     [] = last_resource_dtor_call(),
 2128:     release_resource(OttoPtr),
 2129:     {OttoPtr,OttoBin,1} = last_resource_dtor_call(),
 2130:     ok.
 2131:     
 2132: resource_otto_do(Type) ->
 2133:     OttoBin = <<"Otto Ordonnans">>,
 2134:     OttoPtr = alloc_resource(Type, OttoBin),
 2135:     Otto = make_resource(OttoPtr),
 2136:     true = is_reference(Otto),
 2137:     %% forget resource term but keep referenced by NIF
 2138:     {OttoPtr, OttoBin}.    
 2139: 
 2140: resource_new(Type) ->
 2141:     {PtrB,BinB} = resource_new_do1(Type),
 2142:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2143:     {PtrB,BinB,1} = last_resource_dtor_call(),
 2144:     ok.
 2145:     
 2146: resource_new_do1(Type) ->
 2147:     {{PtrA,BinA}, {ResB,PtrB,BinB}} = resource_new_do2(Type),
 2148:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2149:     {PtrA,BinA,1} = last_resource_dtor_call(),
 2150:     {PtrB,BinB} = get_resource(Type, ResB),
 2151:     %% forget ResB and make it garbage
 2152:     {PtrB,BinB}.
 2153:     
 2154: resource_new_do2(Type) ->
 2155:     BinA = <<"NewA">>,
 2156:     BinB = <<"NewB">>,
 2157:     ResA = make_new_resource(Type, BinA),
 2158:     ResB = make_new_resource(Type, BinB),
 2159:     true = is_reference(ResA),
 2160:     true = is_reference(ResB),
 2161:     true = (ResA /= ResB),
 2162:     {PtrA,BinA} = get_resource(Type, ResA),
 2163:     {PtrB,BinB} = get_resource(Type, ResB),
 2164:     true = (PtrA =/= PtrB),
 2165:     %% forget ResA and make it garbage
 2166:     {{PtrA,BinA}, {ResB,PtrB,BinB}}.
 2167: 
 2168: resource_neg(TypeA) ->
 2169:     resource_neg_do(TypeA),
 2170: 
 2171:     catch exit(42), % dummy exception to purge saved stacktraces from earlier exception
 2172:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2173:     {_,_,2} = last_resource_dtor_call(),
 2174:     ok.
 2175: 
 2176: resource_neg_do(TypeA) ->
 2177:     TypeB = get_resource_type(1),
 2178:     ResA = make_new_resource(TypeA, <<"Arnold">>),
 2179:     ResB= make_new_resource(TypeB, <<"Bobo">>),
 2180:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch get_resource(TypeA, ResB)),
 2181:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch get_resource(TypeB, ResA)),
 2182: 
 2183:     %% Test init_resource_type fail outside load/upgrade
 2184:     {0, ?RT_CREATE} = init_resource_type("in_vain", ?RT_CREATE),
 2185:     {0, ?RT_TAKEOVER} = init_resource_type("Gold", ?RT_TAKEOVER),
 2186:     {0, ?RT_CREATE bor ?RT_TAKEOVER} =
 2187:         init_resource_type("Gold", ?RT_CREATE bor ?RT_TAKEOVER),
 2188:     ok.
 2189: 
 2190: %% Test enif_make_resource_binary
 2191: resource_binary(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2192:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2193:     {Ptr,Bin} = resource_binary_do(),
 2194:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2195:     Last = last_resource_dtor_call(),
 2196:     ?CHECK({Ptr,Bin,1}, Last),
 2197:     ok.
 2198: 
 2199: resource_binary_do() ->
 2200:     Bin = <<"Hej Hopp i lingonskogen">>,
 2201:     {Ptr,ResBin1} = make_new_resource_binary(Bin),
 2202:     ResBin1 = Bin,          
 2203:     ResInfo = {Ptr,_} = get_resource(binary_resource_type,ResBin1),
 2204: 
 2205:     Papa = self(),
 2206:     {Forwarder,_} = spawn_monitor(fun() -> forwarder(Papa) end),
 2207:     io:format("sending to forwarder pid=~p\n",[Forwarder]),  
 2208:     Forwarder ! ResBin1,
 2209:     ResBin2 = receive_any(),
 2210:     ResBin2 = ResBin1,
 2211:     ResInfo = get_resource(binary_resource_type,ResBin2),
 2212:     Forwarder ! terminate,
 2213:     {'DOWN', _, process, Forwarder, 1} = receive_any(),
 2214:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2215:     ResInfo = get_resource(binary_resource_type,ResBin1),
 2216:     ResInfo = get_resource(binary_resource_type,ResBin2),
 2217:     ResInfo.
 2218: 
 2219: %% Test resource takeover by module upgrade
 2220: resource_takeover(Config) when is_list(Config) ->    
 2221:     TmpMem = tmpmem(),
 2222:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 2223: 
 2224:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2225:     File = filename:join(Data, "nif_mod"),
 2226:     {ok,nif_mod,ModBin} = compile:file(File, [binary,return_errors]),
 2227:     {module,nif_mod} = erlang:load_module(nif_mod,ModBin),
 2228: 
 2229:     ok = nif_mod:load_nif_lib(Config, 1, 
 2230:                               [{resource_type, 0, ?RT_CREATE, "resource_type_A",resource_dtor_A,
 2231:                                 ?RT_CREATE},
 2232:                                {resource_type, 1, ?RT_CREATE, "resource_type_null_A",null,
 2233:                                 ?RT_CREATE},
 2234:                                {resource_type, 2, ?RT_CREATE bor ?RT_TAKEOVER, "resource_type_A_null",resource_dtor_A,
 2235:                                 ?RT_CREATE},
 2236:                                {resource_type, 3, ?RT_CREATE, "resource_type_B_goneX",resource_dtor_B,
 2237:                                 ?RT_CREATE},
 2238:                                {resource_type, 4, ?RT_CREATE, "resource_type_null_goneX",null,
 2239:                                 ?RT_CREATE},
 2240:                                {resource_type, null, ?RT_TAKEOVER, "Pink unicorn", resource_dtor_A,
 2241:                                 ?RT_TAKEOVER}
 2242:                               ]),
 2243: 
 2244:     hold_nif_mod_priv_data(nif_mod:get_priv_data_ptr()),
 2245:     [{load,1,1,101},{get_priv_data_ptr,1,2,102}] = nif_mod_call_history(),
 2246: 
 2247:     {Holder, _MRef} = spawn_opt(fun resource_holder/0, [link, monitor]),
 2248: 
 2249:     {A1,BinA1} = make_resource(0,Holder,"A1"),
 2250:     {A2,BinA2} = make_resource(0,Holder,"A2"),
 2251:     {A3,BinA3} = make_resource(0,Holder,"A3"),
 2252: 
 2253:     {NA1,_BinNA1} = make_resource(1,Holder,"NA1"),
 2254:     {NA2,BinNA2} = make_resource(1,Holder,"NA2"),
 2255:     {NA3,_BinNA3} = make_resource(1,Holder,"NA3"),
 2256: 
 2257:     {AN1,BinAN1} = make_resource(2,Holder,"AN1"),
 2258:     {AN2,_BinAN2} = make_resource(2,Holder,"AN2"),
 2259:     {AN3,BinAN3} = make_resource(2,Holder,"AN3"),
 2260:

 2262:     {BGX2,BinBGX2} = make_resource(3,Holder,"BGX2"),
 2263:

 2265:     {NGX2,_BinNGX2} = make_resource(4,Holder,"NGX2"),
 2266: 
 2267:     [] = nif_mod_call_history(),
 2268:

 2270:     [{{resource_dtor_A_v1,BinA1},1,3,103}] = nif_mod_call_history(),

 2273:     [] = nif_mod_call_history(), % no dtor

 2280:

 2282:     ?CHECK([], nif_mod_call_history()), % no dtor
 2283: 
 2284:     {module,nif_mod} = erlang:load_module(nif_mod,ModBin),
 2285:     ok = nif_mod:load_nif_lib(Config, 2,
 2286:                               [{resource_type, 0, ?RT_TAKEOVER, "resource_type_A",resource_dtor_A,
 2287:                                 ?RT_TAKEOVER},
 2288:                                {resource_type, 1, ?RT_TAKEOVER bor ?RT_CREATE, "resource_type_null_A",resource_dtor_A,

 2533: 				?RT_TAKEOVER},

 2536: 			      ]),

 2538:     hold_nif_mod_priv_data(nif_mod:get_priv_data_ptr()),
 2539:     [{load,1,1,101},{get_priv_data_ptr,1,2,102}] = nif_mod_call_history(),
 2540: 
 2541:     {NA7,BinNA7} = make_resource(0, Holder, "NA7"),
 2542:     {AN7,_BinAN7} = make_resource(1, Holder, "AN7"),
 2543:

 2545:     [{{resource_dtor_A_v1,BinNA7},1,_,_}] = nif_mod_call_history(),
 2546: 
 2547:     ok = forget_resource(AN7),
 2548:     [] = nif_mod_call_history(),
 2549: 
 2550:     true = erlang:delete_module(nif_mod),
 2551:     true = erlang:purge_module(nif_mod),
 2552: 
 2553:     true = lists:member(?MODULE, erlang:system_info(taints)),
 2554:     true = lists:member(nif_mod, erlang:system_info(taints)),
 2555:     verify_tmpmem(TmpMem),    
 2556:     ok.
 2557: 
 2558: make_resource(Type,Holder,Str) when is_list(Str) ->
 2559:     Bin = list_to_binary(Str),
 2560:     A1 = make_resource_do(Type,Holder,Bin),
 2561:     Bin = read_resource(Type,A1),
 2562:     {A1,Bin}.
 2563: 
 2564: make_resource_do(Type, Holder, Bin) ->
 2565:     Holder ! {self(), make, Type, Bin},
 2566:     {Holder, make_ok, Id} = receive_any(),
 2567:     {Holder,Id}.
 2568: 
 2569: read_resource(Type, {Holder,Id}) ->
 2570:     Holder ! {self(), get, Type, Id},
 2571:     {Holder, get_ok, Bin} = receive_any(),
 2572:     Bin.
 2573: 
 2574: forget_resource({Holder,Id}) ->
 2575:     Holder ! {self(), forget, Id},
 2576:     {Holder, forget_ok, Id} = receive_any(),
 2577:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(wait, aux_work),
 2578:     ok.
 2579: 
 2580: 
 2581: resource_holder() ->
 2582:     resource_holder([]).
 2583: resource_holder(List) ->
 2584:     %%io:format("resource_holder waiting for msg\n", []),
 2585:     Msg = receive_any(),
 2586:     %%io:format("resource_holder got ~p with list = ~p\n", [Msg,List]),
 2587:     case Msg of
 2588: 	{Pid, make, Type, Bin} ->	    
 2589: 	    Resource = nif_mod:make_new_resource(Type, Bin),
 2590: 	    Id = {make_ref(),Bin},
 2591: 	    Pid ! {self(), make_ok, Id},
 2592: 	    resource_holder([{Id,Resource} | List]);
 2593: 	{Pid, get, Type, Id} ->
 2594: 	    {Id,Resource} = lists:keyfind(Id, 1, List),
 2595: 	    Pid ! {self(), get_ok, nif_mod:get_resource(Type, Resource)},
 2596: 	    resource_holder(List);
 2597: 	
 2598: 	{Pid, forget, Id} ->
 2599: 	    NewList = lists:keydelete(Id, 1, List),
 2600: 	    %%io:format("resource_holder forget: NewList = ~p\n", [NewList]),
 2601: 	    resource_holder(Pid, {self(),forget_ok,Id}, NewList)
 2602:     end.
 2603: 
 2604: resource_holder(Pid,Reply,List) ->
 2605:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2606:     %%io:format("resource_holder GC'ed, now send ~p to ~p\n", [Reply,Pid]),
 2607:     Pid ! Reply,
 2608:     resource_holder(List).
 2609: 
 2610: 
 2611: %% Test the threading API functions (reuse tests from driver API)
 2612: threading(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2613:     case erlang:system_info(threads) of
 2614:     	true -> threading_do(Config);
 2615: 	false -> {skipped,"No thread support"}
 2616:     end.
 2617: 
 2618: threading_do(Config) ->
 2619:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2620:     File = filename:join(Data, "tester"),
 2621:     {ok,tester,ModBin} = compile:file(File, [binary,return_errors]),
 2622:     {module,tester} = erlang:load_module(tester,ModBin),
 2623: 
 2624:     ok = tester:load_nif_lib(Config, "basic"),   
 2625:     ok = tester:run(),
 2626: 
 2627:     erlang:load_module(tester,ModBin),
 2628:     erlang:purge_module(tester),
 2629:     ok = tester:load_nif_lib(Config, "rwlock"),
 2630:     ok = tester:run(),
 2631: 
 2632:     erlang:load_module(tester,ModBin),
 2633:     erlang:purge_module(tester),
 2634:     ok = tester:load_nif_lib(Config, "tsd"),
 2635:     ok = tester:run(),
 2636: 
 2637:     erlang:delete_module(tester),
 2638:     erlang:purge_module(tester).
 2639: 
 2640: 
 2641: %% Test NIF message sending
 2642: send(Config) when is_list(Config) ->    
 2643:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 2644: 
 2645:     N = 1500,
 2646:     List = lists:seq(1,N),
 2647:     {ok,1} = send_list_seq(N, self),
 2648:     {ok,1} = send_list_seq(N, self()),
 2649:     List = receive_any(),
 2650:     List = receive_any(),
 2651:     Papa = self(),
 2652:     spawn_link(fun() -> {ok,1} = send_list_seq(N, Papa) end),
 2653:     List = receive_any(),
 2654: 
 2655:     {ok, 1, BlobS} = send_new_blob(self(), other_term()),
 2656:     BlobR = receive_any(),
 2657:     io:format("Sent ~p\nGot ~p\n", [BlobS, BlobR]),
 2658:     BlobR = BlobS,
 2659: 
 2660:     %% send to dead pid
 2661:     {DeadPid, DeadMon} = spawn_monitor(fun() -> void end),
 2662:     {'DOWN', DeadMon, process, DeadPid, normal} = receive_any(),
 2663:     {ok,0} = send_list_seq(7, DeadPid),
 2664:     ok.
 2665: 
 2666: 
 2667: %% Test tracing of enif_send
 2668: send_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2669:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 2670: 
 2671:     Papa = self(),
 2672:     N = 1500,
 2673:     List = lists:seq(1,N),
 2674: 
 2675:     Tracer = spawn_link(fun F() -> receive get -> Papa ! receive_any(), F() end end),
 2676: 
 2677:     erlang:trace(self(), true, [send,'receive',{tracer,Tracer}]),
 2678:     {ok,1} = send_list_seq(N, self()),
 2679:     List = receive_any(),
 2680:     timeout = receive_any(0),
 2681:     Tracer ! get,
 2682:     {trace,Papa,send,List,Papa} = receive_any(),
 2683:     Tracer ! get,
 2684:     {trace,Papa,'receive',List} = receive_any().
 2685: 
 2686: %% Test that seq_trace works with nif trace
 2687: send_seq_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2688:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 2689: 
 2690:     Papa = self(),
 2691:     N = 1500,
 2692:     List = lists:seq(1,N),
 2693:     Label = make_ref(),
 2694: 
 2695:     Tracer = spawn_link(fun F() -> receive get -> Papa ! receive_any(), F() end end),
 2696: 
 2697:     seq_trace:set_system_tracer(Tracer),
 2698:     seq_trace:set_token(label,Label),
 2699:     seq_trace:set_token(send,true),
 2700:     seq_trace:set_token('receive',true),
 2701: 
 2702:     {ok,1} = send_list_seq(N, self()),
 2703:     List = receive_any(),
 2704:     timeout = receive_any(0),
 2705:     {ok,1} = send_list_seq(N, self()),
 2706:     List = receive_any(),
 2707:     timeout = receive_any(0),
 2708: 
 2709:     Tracer ! get,
 2710:     {seq_trace,Label,{send,{0,1},Papa,Papa,List}} = receive_any(),
 2711:     Tracer ! get,
 2712:     {seq_trace,Label,{'receive',{0,1},Papa,Papa,List}} = receive_any(),
 2713:     Tracer ! get,
 2714:     {seq_trace,Label,{send,{1,2},Papa,Papa,List}} = receive_any(),
 2715:     Tracer ! get,
 2716:     {seq_trace,Label,{'receive',{1,2},Papa,Papa,List}} = receive_any().
 2717: 
 2718: 
 2719: %% More NIF message sending
 2720: send2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2721:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 2722: 
 2723:     send2_do1(fun send_blob_dbg/2),
 2724:     ok.
 2725: 
 2726: %% Send msg from user thread
 2727: send_threaded(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2728:     send2_do1(fun(ME,To) -> send_blob_thread_dbg(ME,To,join) end),
 2729:     send2_do1(fun(ME,To) -> send_blob_thread_and_join(ME,To) end),
 2730:     ok.
 2731: 
 2732: 
 2733: send2_do1(SendBlobF) ->
 2734:     io:format("sending to self=~p\n",[self()]),
 2735:     send2_do2(SendBlobF, self()),
 2736: 
 2737:     Papa = self(),
 2738:     {Forwarder,_} = spawn_monitor(fun() -> forwarder(Papa) end),
 2739:     io:format("sending to forwarder pid=~p\n",[Forwarder]),
 2740:     send2_do2(SendBlobF, Forwarder),
 2741:     Forwarder ! terminate,
 2742:     {'DOWN', _, process, Forwarder, 4} = receive_any(),
 2743:     ok.
 2744: 
 2745: send2_do2(SendBlobF, To) ->   
 2746:     MsgEnv = alloc_msgenv(),
 2747:     repeat(50, fun(_) -> grow_blob(MsgEnv,other_term()) end, []),
 2748:     {ok,1,Blob0} = SendBlobF(MsgEnv, To),
 2749:     Blob1 = receive_any(),
 2750:     Blob1 = Blob0,
 2751:     
 2752:     clear_msgenv(MsgEnv),
 2753:     repeat(50, fun(_) -> grow_blob(MsgEnv,other_term()) end, []),
 2754:     {ok,1,Blob2} = SendBlobF(MsgEnv, To),
 2755:     Blob3 = receive_any(),
 2756:     Blob3 = Blob2,
 2757: 
 2758:     clear_msgenv(MsgEnv),
 2759:     repeat(50, fun(_) -> grow_blob(MsgEnv,other_term()) end, []),
 2760: 
 2761:     clear_msgenv(MsgEnv),
 2762:     repeat(50, fun(_) -> grow_blob(MsgEnv,other_term()) end, []),
 2763:     {ok,1,Blob4} = SendBlobF(MsgEnv, To),
 2764:     Blob5 = receive_any(),
 2765:     Blob5 = Blob4,
 2766: 
 2767:     clear_msgenv(MsgEnv),
 2768:     clear_msgenv(MsgEnv),
 2769:     repeat(50, fun(_) -> grow_blob(MsgEnv,other_term()) end, []),
 2770:     {ok,1,Blob6} = SendBlobF(MsgEnv, To),
 2771:     Blob7 = receive_any(),
 2772:     Blob7 = Blob6,
 2773: 
 2774:     ok.
 2775: 
 2776: 
 2777: send_blob_thread_and_join(MsgEnv, To) ->
 2778:     {ok,Blob} = send_blob_thread_dbg(MsgEnv, To, no_join),
 2779:     {ok,SendRes} = join_send_thread(MsgEnv),
 2780:     {ok,SendRes,Blob}.
 2781: 
 2782: send_blob_dbg(MsgEnv, To) ->
 2783:     Ret = send_blob(MsgEnv, To),
 2784:     %%io:format("send_blob to ~p returned ~p\n",[To,Ret]),
 2785:     Ret.
 2786: 
 2787: send_blob_thread_dbg(MsgEnv, To, Join) ->
 2788:     Ret = send_blob_thread(MsgEnv, To, Join),
 2789:     %%io:format("send_blob_thread to ~p Join=~p returned ~p\n",[To,Join,Ret]),
 2790:     Ret.
 2791: 
 2792: 
 2793: forwarder(To) ->
 2794:     forwarder(To, 0).
 2795: forwarder(To, N) ->
 2796:     case receive_any() of
 2797: 	terminate ->
 2798:             gc_and_exit(N);
 2799: 	Msg ->	    
 2800: 	    To ! Msg,	   
 2801: 	    forwarder(To, N+1)
 2802:     end.
 2803: 
 2804: other_term() ->
 2805:     {fun(X,Y) -> X*Y end, make_ref()}.
 2806: 
 2807: %% Message sending stress test
 2808: send3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2809:     %% Let a number of processes send random message blobs between each other
 2810:     %% using enif_send. Kill and spawn new ones randomly to keep a ~constant
 2811:     %% number of workers running.
 2812:     rand:seed(exsplus),
 2813:     io:format("seed: ~p\n",[rand:export_seed()]),
 2814:     ets:new(nif_SUITE,[named_table,public]),
 2815:     true = ets:insert(nif_SUITE,{send3,0,0,0,0}),
 2816:     timer:send_after(10000, timeout), % Run for 10 seconds
 2817:     SpawnCnt = send3_controller(0, [], [], 20),
 2818:     [{_,Rcv,SndOk,SndFail,Balance}] = ets:lookup(nif_SUITE,send3),
 2819:     io:format("spawns=~p received=~p, sent=~p send-failure=~p balance=~p\n",
 2820:               [SpawnCnt,Rcv,SndOk,SndFail,Balance]),
 2821:     ets:delete(nif_SUITE).
 2822: 
 2823: send3_controller(SpawnCnt, [], _, infinity) ->
 2824:     SpawnCnt;
 2825: send3_controller(SpawnCnt0, Mons0, Pids0, Tick) ->
 2826:     receive 
 2827:         timeout ->
 2828:             io:format("Timeout. Sending 'halt' to ~p\n",[Pids0]),            
 2829:             lists:foreach(fun(P) -> P ! {halt,self()} end, Pids0),
 2830:             lists:foreach(fun(P) -> receive {halted,P} -> ok end end, Pids0),
 2831:             QTot = lists:foldl(fun(P,QSum) ->
 2832:                                  {message_queue_len,QLen} = 
 2833:                                     erlang:process_info(P,message_queue_len),
 2834:                                  QSum + QLen
 2835:                                end, 0, Pids0),
 2836:             io:format("Total queue length ~p\n",[QTot]),            
 2837:             lists:foreach(fun(P) -> P ! die end, Pids0),
 2838:             send3_controller(SpawnCnt0, Mons0, [], infinity);
 2839:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, _Pid, _} ->
 2840:             Mons1 = lists:delete(MonRef, Mons0),
 2841:             %%io:format("Got DOWN from ~p. Monitors left: ~p\n",[Pid,Mons1]),            
 2842:             send3_controller(SpawnCnt0, Mons1, Pids0, Tick)
 2843:     after Tick -> 
 2844:         Max = 20,
 2845:         N = length(Pids0),
 2846:         PidN = rand:uniform(Max),
 2847:         %%io:format("N=~p PidN=~p Pids0=~p\n", [N,PidN,Pids0]), 
 2848:         case PidN > N of
 2849:             true ->
 2850:                 {NewPid,Mon} = spawn_opt(fun send3_proc/0, [link,monitor]),                
 2851:                 lists:foreach(fun(P) -> P ! {is_born,NewPid} end, Pids0),
 2852:                 Balance = ets:lookup_element(nif_SUITE,send3,5),
 2853:                 Inject = (Balance =< 0),
 2854:                 case Inject of
 2855:                     true ->  ok;
 2856:                     false -> ets:update_element(nif_SUITE,send3,{5,-1})
 2857:                 end,
 2858:                 NewPid ! {pids,Pids0,Inject},
 2859:                 send3_controller(SpawnCnt0+1, [Mon|Mons0], [NewPid|Pids0], Tick);
 2860:             false ->
 2861:                 KillPid = lists:nth(PidN,Pids0),
 2862:                 KillPid ! die,
 2863:                 Pids1 = lists:delete(KillPid, Pids0),
 2864:                 lists:foreach(fun(P) -> P ! {is_dead,KillPid} end, Pids1),
 2865:                 send3_controller(SpawnCnt0, Mons0, Pids1, Tick)
 2866:         end        
 2867:    end.
 2868: 
 2869: send3_proc() ->
 2870:     %%io:format("Process ~p spawned\n",[self()]),
 2871:     send3_proc([self()], {0,0,0}, {1,2,3,4,5}).
 2872: send3_proc(Pids0, Counters={Rcv,SndOk,SndFail}, State0) ->
 2873:     %%io:format("~p: Pids0=~p", [self(), Pids0]),
 2874:     %%timer:sleep(10),
 2875:     receive 
 2876:         {pids, Pids1, Inject} ->
 2877:             %%io:format("~p: got ~p Inject=~p\n", [self(), Pids1, Inject]), 
 2878:             Pids0 = [self()],
 2879:             Pids2 = [self() | Pids1],
 2880:             case Inject of
 2881:                 true -> send3_proc_send(Pids2, Counters, State0);
 2882:                 false -> send3_proc(Pids2, Counters, State0)
 2883:             end;
 2884:         {is_born, Pid} ->
 2885:             %%io:format("~p: is_born ~p, got ~p\n", [self(), Pid, Pids0]), 
 2886:             send3_proc([Pid | Pids0], Counters, State0);
 2887:         {is_dead, Pid} ->            
 2888:             Pids1 = lists:delete(Pid,Pids0),
 2889:             %%io:format("~p: is_dead ~p, got ~p\n", [self(), Pid, Pids1]),
 2890:             send3_proc(Pids1, Counters, State0);
 2891:         {blob, Blob0} ->
 2892:             %%io:format("~p: blob ~p\n", [self(), Blob0]),
 2893:             State1 = send3_new_state(State0, Blob0),
 2894:             send3_proc_send(Pids0, {Rcv+1,SndOk,SndFail}, State1);
 2895:         die ->
 2896:             %%io:format("Process ~p terminating, stats = ~p\n",[self(),Counters]),
 2897:             {message_queue_len,Dropped} = erlang:process_info(self(),message_queue_len),
 2898:             _R = ets:update_counter(nif_SUITE,send3,
 2899:                                [{2,Rcv},{3,SndOk},{4,SndFail},{5,1-Dropped}]),
 2900:             %%io:format("~p: dies R=~p\n", [self(), R]),
 2901:             ok;
 2902:         {halt,Papa} ->
 2903:             Papa ! {halted,self()},
 2904:             io:format("~p halted\n",[self()]),
 2905:             receive die -> ok end,
 2906:             io:format("~p dying\n",[self()])
 2907:     end.
 2908: 
 2909: send3_proc_send(Pids, {Rcv,SndOk,SndFail}, State0) ->
 2910:     To = lists:nth(rand:uniform(length(Pids)),Pids),
 2911:     Blob = send3_make_blob(),
 2912:     State1 = send3_new_state(State0,Blob), 
 2913:     case send3_send(To, Blob) of
 2914:         true ->
 2915:             send3_proc(Pids, {Rcv,SndOk+1,SndFail}, State1);
 2916:         false ->
 2917:             send3_proc(Pids, {Rcv,SndOk,SndFail+1}, State1)
 2918:     end.
 2919: 
 2920: 
 2921: send3_make_blob() ->    
 2922:     case rand:uniform(20)-1 of
 2923:         0 -> {term,[]};
 2924:         N ->
 2925:             MsgEnv = alloc_msgenv(), 
 2926:             repeat(N bsr 1,
 2927:                    fun(_) -> grow_blob(MsgEnv,other_term(),rand:uniform(1 bsl 20))
 2928:                    end, void),
 2929:             case (N band 3) of
 2930:                 0 -> {term,copy_blob(MsgEnv)};
 2931:                 1 -> {copy,copy_blob(MsgEnv)};
 2932:                 _ -> {msgenv,MsgEnv}
 2933:             end
 2934:     end.
 2935: 
 2936: send3_send(Pid, Msg) ->
 2937:     %% 90% enif_send and 10% normal bang
 2938:     case rand:uniform(10) of
 2939:         1 -> send3_send_bang(Pid,Msg);
 2940:         _ -> send3_send_nif(Pid,Msg)
 2941:     end.
 2942: send3_send_nif(Pid, {term,Blob}) ->
 2943:     %%io:format("~p send term nif\n",[self()]),
 2944:     send_term(Pid, {blob, Blob}) =:= 1;
 2945: send3_send_nif(Pid, {copy,Blob}) ->
 2946:     %%io:format("~p send term nif\n",[self()]),
 2947:     send_copy_term(Pid, {blob, Blob}) =:= 1;
 2948: send3_send_nif(Pid, {msgenv,MsgEnv}) ->
 2949:     %%io:format("~p send blob nif\n",[self()]),   
 2950:     send3_blob(MsgEnv, Pid, blob) =:= 1.
 2951: 
 2952: send3_send_bang(Pid, {term,Blob}) ->
 2953:     %%io:format("~p send term bang\n",[self()]),   
 2954:     Pid ! {blob, Blob},
 2955:     true;
 2956: send3_send_bang(Pid, {copy,Blob}) ->
 2957:     %%io:format("~p send term bang\n",[self()]),
 2958:     Pid ! {blob, Blob},
 2959:     true;
 2960: send3_send_bang(Pid, {msgenv,MsgEnv}) ->
 2961:     %%io:format("~p send blob bang\n",[self()]),   
 2962:     Pid ! {blob, copy_blob(MsgEnv)},
 2963:     true.
 2964: 
 2965: send3_new_state(State, Blob) ->
 2966:     case rand:uniform(5+2) of
 2967:         N when N =< 5-> setelement(N, State, Blob);
 2968:         _ -> State  % Don't store blob
 2969:     end.
 2970: 
 2971: %% Negative testing of load_nif
 2972: neg(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2973:     TmpMem = tmpmem(),
 2974:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang:load_nif(badarg, 0)),
 2975:     
 2976:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2977:     File = filename:join(Data, "nif_mod"),
 2978:     {ok,nif_mod,Bin} = compile:file(File, [binary,return_errors]),
 2979:     {module,nif_mod} = erlang:load_module(nif_mod,Bin),
 2980: 
 2981:     {error,{load_failed,"Failed to load NIF library"++_}} = nif_mod:load_nif_lib(Config, 0),
 2982:     {error,{bad_lib,"Failed to find library init"++_}} = nif_mod:load_nif_lib(Config, 3),
 2983:     {error,{bad_lib,"Function not found"++_}} = nif_mod:load_nif_lib(Config, 4),
 2984:     {error,{bad_lib,"Duplicate NIF entry for"++_}} = nif_mod:load_nif_lib(Config, 5),
 2985:     verify_tmpmem(TmpMem),
 2986:     ok.
 2987: 
 2988: %% Test all enif_is functions
 2989: is_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2990:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2991:     ok = check_is(hejsan, <<19,98>>, make_ref(), ok, fun() -> ok end,
 2992: 			self(), hd(erlang:ports()), [], [1,9,9,8],
 2993: 			{hejsan, "hejsan", [$h,"ejs",<<"an">>]}, 12),
 2994:     ok = check_is(hejsan, <<19,98>>, make_ref(), ok, fun() -> ok end,
 2995: 			self(), hd(erlang:ports()), [], [1,9,9,8],
 2996: 			{hejsan, "hejsan", [$h,"ejs",<<"an">>]}, -12),
 2997:     ok = check_is(hejsan, <<19,98>>, make_ref(), ok, fun() -> ok end,
 2998: 			self(), hd(erlang:ports()), [], [1,9,9,8],
 2999: 			{hejsan, "hejsan", [$h,"ejs",<<"an">>]}, 18446744073709551617),
 3000:     ok = check_is(hejsan, <<19,98>>, make_ref(), ok, fun() -> ok end,
 3001: 			self(), hd(erlang:ports()), [], [1,9,9,8],
 3002: 			{hejsan, "hejsan", [$h,"ejs",<<"an">>]}, -18446744073709551617),
 3003:     ok = check_is(hejsan, <<19,98>>, make_ref(), ok, fun() -> ok end,
 3004: 			self(), hd(erlang:ports()), [], [1,9,9,8],
 3005: 			{hejsan, "hejsan", [$h,"ejs",<<"an">>]}, 99.146),
 3006:     ok = check_is(hejsan, <<19,98>>, make_ref(), ok, fun() -> ok end,
 3007: 			self(), hd(erlang:ports()), [], [1,9,9,8],
 3008: 			{hejsan, "hejsan", [$h,"ejs",<<"an">>]}, -99.146),
 3009:     ok = check_is(hejsan, <<19,98>>, make_ref(), ok, fun() -> ok end,
 3010: 			self(), hd(erlang:ports()), [], [1,9,9,8],
 3011: 			{hejsan, "hejsan", [$h,"ejs",<<"an">>]}, 18446744073709551616.2e2),
 3012:     ok = check_is(hejsan, <<19,98>>, make_ref(), ok, fun() -> ok end,
 3013: 			self(), hd(erlang:ports()), [], [1,9,9,8],
 3014: 			{hejsan, "hejsan", [$h,"ejs",<<"an">>]}, -18446744073709551616.2e2),
 3015:     try
 3016:         check_is_exception(),
 3017:         throw(expected_badarg)
 3018:     catch
 3019:         error:badarg ->
 3020:             ok
 3021:     end.
 3022: 
 3023: %% Test all enif_get_length functions
 3024: get_length(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3025:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 3026:     ok = length_test(hejsan, "hejsan", [], [], not_a_list, [1,2|3]).
 3027: 
 3028: ensure_lib_loaded(Config) ->
 3029:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1).
 3030: ensure_lib_loaded(Config, Ver) ->
 3031:     Path = ?config(data_dir, Config),
 3032:     case lib_version() of
 3033:         undefined ->
 3034:             Lib = "nif_SUITE." ++ integer_to_list(Ver),
 3035:             ok = erlang:load_nif(filename:join(Path,Lib), []);
 3036:         Ver when is_integer(Ver) ->
 3037:             ok
 3038:     end,
 3039:     erl_ddll:try_load(Path, echo_drv, []),
 3040:     ok.
 3041: 
 3042: make_atom(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3043:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 3044:     An0Atom = an0atom,
 3045:     An0Atom0 = 'an\000atom\000',
 3046:     Atoms = make_atoms(),
 3047:     7 = size(Atoms),
 3048:     Atoms = {An0Atom,An0Atom,An0Atom,An0Atom0,An0Atom,An0Atom,An0Atom0}.
 3049: 
 3050: make_string(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3051:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 3052:     Strings = make_strings(),
 3053:     5 = size(Strings),
 3054:     A0String = "a0string",
 3055:     A0String0 = [$a,0,$s,$t,$r,$i,$n,$g,0],
 3056:     AStringWithAccents = [$E,$r,$l,$a,$n,$g,$ ,16#e4,$r,$ ,$e,$t,$t,$ ,$g,$e,$n,$e,$r,$e,$l,$l,$t,$ ,$p,$r,$o,$g,$r,$a,$m,$s,$p,$r,16#e5,$k],
 3057:     Strings = {A0String,A0String,A0String,A0String0, AStringWithAccents}.
 3058: 
 3059: reverse_list_test(Config) ->
 3060:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 3061:     List = lists:seq(1,100),
 3062:     RevList = lists:reverse(List),
 3063:     RevList = reverse_list(List),
 3064:     badarg = reverse_list(foo).
 3065: 
 3066: %% Memory leak of tmp-buffer when inspecting iolist or unaligned binary in unbound environment
 3067: otp_9668(Config) ->
 3068:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 3069:     TmpMem = tmpmem(),
 3070:     IOList = ["This",' ',<<"is">>,' ',[<<"an iolist">>,'.']],    
 3071:     otp_9668_nif(IOList),
 3072: 
 3073:     <<_:5/bitstring,UnalignedBin:10/binary,_/bitstring>> = <<"Abuse me as unaligned">>,
 3074:     otp_9668_nif(UnalignedBin),
 3075: 
 3076:     verify_tmpmem(TmpMem),
 3077:     ok.
 3078: 
 3079: %% Copy of writable binary
 3080: otp_9828(Config) ->
 3081:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 3082:     otp_9828_loop(<<"I'm alive!">>, 1000).
 3083: 
 3084: otp_9828_loop(_Bin, 0) ->
 3085:     ok;
 3086: otp_9828_loop(Bin, Val) ->
 3087:     WrtBin = <<Bin/binary, Val:32>>,
 3088:     ok = otp_9828_nif(WrtBin),
 3089:     otp_9828_loop(WrtBin, Val-1).
 3090: 
 3091: 
 3092: consume_timeslice(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3093:     case {erlang:system_info(debug_compiled),
 3094: 	  erlang:system_info(lock_checking)} of
 3095: 	{false, false} ->
 3096: 	    consume_timeslice_test(Config);
 3097: 	{false, true} ->
 3098: 	    {skipped, "Lock checking enabled"};
 3099: 	_ ->
 3100: 	    {skipped, "Debug compiled"}
 3101:     end.
 3102: 
 3103: consume_timeslice_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3104:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3105:     CONTEXT_REDS = 4000,
 3106:     Me = self(),
 3107:     Go = make_ref(),
 3108:     RedDiff = make_ref(),
 3109:     Done = make_ref(),
 3110:     DummyMFA = {?MODULE,dummy_call,1},
 3111:     P = spawn(fun () ->
 3112:                       receive Go -> ok end,
 3113:                       {reductions, R1} = process_info(self(), reductions),
 3114:                       1 = consume_timeslice_nif(100, false),
 3115:                       dummy_call(111),
 3116:                       0 = consume_timeslice_nif(90, false),
 3117:                       dummy_call(222),
 3118:                       1 = consume_timeslice_nif(10, false),
 3119:                       dummy_call(333),
 3120:                       0 = consume_timeslice_nif(25, false),
 3121:                       0 = consume_timeslice_nif(25, false),
 3122:                       0 = consume_timeslice_nif(25, false),
 3123:                       1 = consume_timeslice_nif(25, false),
 3124:                       0 = consume_timeslice_nif(25, false),
 3125: 
 3126:                       ok = case consume_timeslice_nif(1, true) of
 3127:                                Cnt when Cnt > 70, Cnt < 80 -> ok;
 3128:                                Other -> Other
 3129:                            end,
 3130:                       dummy_call(444),
 3131: 
 3132:                       {reductions, R2} = process_info(self(), reductions),
 3133:                       Me ! {RedDiff, R2 - R1},
 3134:                       exit(Done)
 3135:               end),
 3136:     erlang:yield(),
 3137: 
 3138:     erlang:trace_pattern(DummyMFA, [{'_', [], [{return_trace}]}], [local]),
 3139:     1 = erlang:trace(P, true, [call, running, procs, {tracer, self()}]),
 3140: 
 3141:     P ! Go,
 3142: 
 3143:     %% receive Go -> ok end,
 3144:     {trace, P, in, _} = next_tmsg(P),
 3145: 
 3146:     %% consume_timeslice_nif(100),
 3147:     %% dummy_call(111)
 3148:     %%
 3149:     %% Note that we may be scheduled out immediately before or immediately
 3150:     %% "after" dummy_call(111) depending on when the emulator tests reductions.
 3151:     %%
 3152:     %% In either case, we should be rescheduled before the function returns.
 3153:     Dummy_111 = {?MODULE,dummy_call,[111]},
 3154:     case next_tmsg(P) of
 3155:         {trace, P, out, _} ->
 3156:             %% See dummy_call(111) above
 3157:             {trace, P, in, _} = next_tmsg(P),
 3158:             {trace, P, call, Dummy_111} = next_tmsg(P);
 3159:         {trace, P, call, Dummy_111} ->
 3160:             {trace, P, out, _} = next_tmsg(P),
 3161:             {trace, P, in, _} = next_tmsg(P)
 3162:     end,
 3163:     {trace, P, return_from, DummyMFA, ok} = next_tmsg(P),
 3164: 
 3165:     %% consume_timeslice_nif(90),
 3166:     %% dummy_call(222)
 3167:     Dummy_222 = {?MODULE,dummy_call,[222]},
 3168:     {trace, P, call, Dummy_222} = next_tmsg(P),
 3169:     {trace, P, return_from, DummyMFA, ok} = next_tmsg(P),
 3170: 
 3171:     %% consume_timeslice_nif(10),
 3172:     %% dummy_call(333)
 3173:     Dummy_333 = {?MODULE,dummy_call,[333]},
 3174:     case next_tmsg(P) of
 3175:         {trace, P, out, _} ->
 3176:             %% See dummy_call(111) above
 3177:             {trace, P, in, _} = next_tmsg(P),
 3178:             {trace, P, call, Dummy_333} = next_tmsg(P);
 3179:         {trace, P, call, Dummy_333} ->
 3180:             {trace, P, out, _} = next_tmsg(P),
 3181:             {trace, P, in, _} = next_tmsg(P)
 3182:     end,
 3183:     {trace, P, return_from, DummyMFA, ok} = next_tmsg(P),
 3184: 
 3185:     %% 25,25,25,25, 25
 3186:     {trace, P, out, {?MODULE,consume_timeslice_nif,2}} = next_tmsg(P),
 3187:     {trace, P, in, {?MODULE,consume_timeslice_nif,2}} = next_tmsg(P),
 3188: 
 3189:     %% consume_timeslice(1,true)
 3190:     %% dummy_call(444)
 3191:     Dummy_444 = {?MODULE,dummy_call,[444]},
 3192:     case next_tmsg(P) of
 3193:         {trace, P, out, DummyMFA} ->
 3194:             %% See dummy_call(111) above
 3195:             {trace, P, in, DummyMFA} = next_tmsg(P),
 3196:             {trace, P, call, Dummy_444} = next_tmsg(P);
 3197:         {trace, P, call, Dummy_444} ->
 3198:             {trace, P, out, DummyMFA} = next_tmsg(P),
 3199:             {trace, P, in, DummyMFA} = next_tmsg(P)
 3200:     end,
 3201:     {trace, P, return_from, DummyMFA, ok} = next_tmsg(P),
 3202: 
 3203:     %% exit(Done)
 3204:     {trace, P, exit, Done} = next_tmsg(P),
 3205: 
 3206:     ExpReds = (100 + 90 + 10 + 25*5 + 75) * CONTEXT_REDS div 100,
 3207:     receive
 3208: 	{RedDiff, Reductions} when Reductions < (ExpReds + 10), Reductions > (ExpReds - 10) ->
 3209: 	    io:format("Reductions = ~p~n", [Reductions]),
 3210: 	    ok;
 3211: 	{RedDiff, Reductions} ->
 3212: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_reduction_count, Reductions, ExpReds})
 3213:     end,
 3214:     
 3215:     none = next_msg(P),
 3216: 
 3217:     ok.
 3218: 
 3219: nif_schedule(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3220:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3221:     A = "this is a string",
 3222:     B = {this,is,a,tuple},
 3223:     {B,A} = call_nif_schedule(A, B),
 3224:     ok = try call_nif_schedule(1, 2)
 3225: 	 catch
 3226: 	     error:badarg:Stk ->
 3227: 		 [{?MODULE,call_nif_schedule,[1,2],_}|_] = Stk,
 3228: 		 ok
 3229: 	 end,
 3230:     ok.
 3231: 
 3232: nif_exception(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3233:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3234:     try
 3235: 	%% this checks that the expected exception occurs when the NIF
 3236: 	%% calls enif_make_badarg at some point but then tries to return a
 3237: 	%% value that isn't an exception
 3238: 	call_nif_exception(0),
 3239: 	ct:fail(expected_badarg)
 3240:     catch
 3241: 	error:badarg ->
 3242: 	    ok
 3243:     end,
 3244:     %% this checks that a NIF can raise various terms as exceptions
 3245:     ok = nif_raise_exceptions(call_nif_exception),
 3246:     ok.
 3247:

 3250:     try
 3251: 	call_nif_nan_or_inf(nan),
 3252: 	ct:fail(expected_badarg)
 3253:     catch
 3254: 	error:badarg ->
 3255: 	    ok
 3256:     end,
 3257:     try
 3258: 	call_nif_nan_or_inf(inf),
 3259: 	ct:fail(expected_badarg)
 3260:     catch
 3261: 	error:badarg ->
 3262: 	    ok
 3263:     end,
 3264:     try
 3265: 	call_nif_nan_or_inf(tuple),
 3266: 	ct:fail(expected_badarg)
 3267:     catch
 3268: 	error:badarg ->
 3269: 	    ok
 3270:     end.
 3271: 
 3272: nif_atom_too_long(Config) when is_list(Config) ->

 3275: 	call_nif_atom_too_long(all),

 3277:     catch
 3278: 	error:badarg ->
 3279: 	    ok
 3280:     end,

 3282: 	call_nif_atom_too_long(len),
